title: Ward Skins On Hextech Crafting?
body: Can i get ward skins via hextech chests? if yes, do i need to use essences?

replies.body: Ward skin shards can drop from chests, and orange essences can be used to craft them into permanent content.  More information on this is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!
